Author: DaveZaky
Title: [ANN][ICO][whitelisting] H2SOL and H2PWR - hydro+solar+crypto+mining
Body: H2SOL & H2PWR  https://h2sol.io  We generate clean energy. We own our power plants. We mine crypto. We own our rigs. Now we're scaling.  Get whitelisted now! https://h2pwr.h2sol.io   ABOUT We are a team of veteran renewable energy experts and DLT specialists ready to scale our existing projects. Our conservative strategy is based on a proven business track record backed by significant underlying assets, setting us apart from most in the current ICO frenzy.  VIDEO https://youtu.be/WmT_lZ09mjc  We have 2 tokens. H2SOL TOKEN: DIVIDEND GENERATING TOKEN THAT DISTRIBUTES GREEN ENERGY MINING REVENUES TO TOKEN HOLDERS. H2PWR TOKEN: UTILITY TOKEN TO RAISE THE FUNDS NECESSARY TO MATERIALIZE THE GLOBAL (LICENSED) SECURITIES FRAMEWORK FOR H2SOL DIVIDEND GENERATING TOKEN.  Why purchase H2PWR token? 1)Be first in line for the (Regulation) pending H2SOL Security Token Sale 2)Enjoy 25% Discount on your H2SOL Tokens. We’ll sell those for $100 so you’re already in profit based on a $10 token sale here. 3)Enjoy 25% Perpetual Discount on our other planned Tokenization Events 4) Enjoy Trading opportunities on great Exchanges 5) Enjoy championing planet-saving green mining 6) Enjoy a front-row seat in Securities Tokenization space  Why purchase H2SOL token?  1) Not a concept After a yearlong successful pilot tested on our well-established 30MWp renewable energy power plants, we are ready to scale. 2) Scaling our power plant operations The token sale will help us fund our pipeline of renewable power plant acquisitions (approx. 90MWp). A major Bank is committed to debt financing so our equity can go further. 3) Scaling our mining operations The token sale will also be used to acquire and install mining rigs, essentially mining with self-generated green energy and leaving zero carbon footprint. 4) Revenue streams The excess power is sold to the grid providing a „safety net“ of guaranteed, long-term revenues aside the mining revenues. 5 What's in it for you „Tokenizing“ our utilities allows you to participate on the first completely integrated renewable power production & green cryptocurrency mining operation with expected (Year 1) IRR of 47% p.a.  When? 17.4.-1.5.2018 (Sign up for Whitelist now!) H2PWR utility token, raising the funds necessary to materialize the global (licensed) securities framework for H2SOL dividend generating token. Essentially a “pre-sale” invitation for the future security H2SOL token purchase, with a initial price of 1 token set at 10 USD, it will offer unique access and 25% discount on future H2SOL token (H2SOL tokens will be sold initially at 100 USD each with 4 million tokens hard cap).  Q4 2018 H2SOL Token dividend generating token, licensed in agreed jurisdictions, funds used to further populate our renewable energy estate with crypto-mining rigs up to pre agreed capacity of 500 million USD hardcap. 1 H2PWR token (10 USD) will allow purchase of 1 H2SOL token in presale for 25% discount (75 USD for 100 USD token). (edited)    Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/H2SOL/  FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/H2SOL.io/ TWITTER : https://twitter.com/H2SOL_io YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-f6dDZnzG6KGQWCcVUgIvQ  Get whitelisted now! https://h2pwr.h2sol.io
